atom_indecomposability: None of these atoms can be factored into simpler logical units within this tier.
Π_binding: TruthAtoms are always evaluated via Π; no direct non-Π truth manipulation allowed.
Θ_binding: PolarityAtoms must be routed via Θ in all logic operations.
Φ_binding: SemanticClassAtoms must be projected via Φ in form calculations.
